comments.body:
I noticed when I re-applied this that I was missing a test that actually tested end to end instead of just testing the
InspectorService.screenshot method.

these columns all moved back 6 characters due to removing optional const.
"const ".length == 6
I had to update these line #s due to the added import at the top of the file.

Thanks for adding a test for this! Can you also dispatch a second error (or the same error) and verify that the errorsSinceReload count increases?
You could also dispatch the event for a hot reload and verify the count is back to zero.
